p: GW Sparahawk Senr sworn for prisoner - examines the Negro - and says he has known him about 19 years - I think he could not have been more than 5 years - when I first knew him - he was then living in the family of Wm L Burk in this city - knew the Negro's mother - she passed for a free woman - many years - before the petitioner was born - cross exn I am certain I have known for 19 years - I never been absent more than 6 mos at a time - he has always passed as free
